name: Alec Bradley - Superstition - Robusto
additionalNotes: The brand’s success can be attributed to owner Alan Rubin, as his high standards won’t allow for anything other than top quality tobaccos and impeccable craftsmanship. Rubin is testing his luck with the latest Alec Bradley Release which has been dubbed Superstition. This highly complex blend utilizes long-filler Cuban Seed tobaccos from Honduras, Nicaragua, and the Dominican with a Habano Jalapa wrapper on the outside. The result is a highly flavorful cigar which boasts hints of spice, espresso, leather, roasted nuts, and a touch of cinnamon. A spine-tingling blend that’s sure to get some serious attention from aficionados everywhere.
